run.step: Step01. Create and open pool Ledger
Step03. Use default Trustee to create a Trustee
Step04. Verify get nym for Trustee
Step05. Verify get nym for Trustee
Step06. Verify get nym for Trustee
Step07. Use TrustAnchor1 to create a Trustee

Step15. Verify TrustAnchor1 cannot create a TrustAnchor3
Step16. Verify TrustAnchor1 cannot blacklist TrustAnchor2
Step17. Close and delete the wallet and the pool ledger...
Step18. Delete the wallet and pool ledger...
